title: WAR: The university of WAR - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Demi-Humans   Fantasy World   Gods   Magic   Male Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: StormDevil
description:
After the humans destroyed the planet, God decided to recreate the world with multiple races as to avoid the same fate.

Instead, an even greater war happened and God disappeared.
A fragile peace followed.

This story is about an ordinary boy named Ester Devald with average magic and low, unawakened psychic powers. 
Today he starts his new school, but because of a mistake, he didn't register for the dorm.

In this school where no one can die, he receives a dark storage room that looks worse than a toilet as accommodation.

What are the secrets of this strange room and what will our protagonist do to lead a normal school life?
Welcome to the *University of WAR*>
